profile: Hi there I have had my masonry company A&E Masonry and Landscaping for the past 25 years. We specialize in custom stone and brick work. We install a number of products that are on the market today. Man made and natural products. We do custom homes,fireplaces,pizza ovens,bbq's,walkways,patio's,driveways,chimney rebuilds and restoration. If it's a masonry product we can install it.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If itâ€™s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Dos Rios Canada Inc. Is licensed and insured to perform work in your home, office or commercial and industrial locations. Our area of expertise is concrete placement and finishing. Doing concrete work is where we mostly find ourselves; however, finishing interior work is a fine skill present within our workforce. DRC was featured in a few episodes of HGTV, although under a different name -Home Works-    


 Mission Statement
 -To solidly construct every project through workmanship and communication  


 Vision Statement
-Known to respond quickly and efficiently  to every business call. A one-call solution for homeowners and big-name constructors within the GTA.

profile:
Helping home owners with their exterior restoration, and giving the best long lasting finished product that they can be proud of! 

Masonry restoration services include: 

- Chimney rebuilds
- Brick, block, stone installations
- Parging
- Tuckpointing
- Windows / Doors enclosures and openings
- Limestone sill installations
and more!

Feel free to send us any information such as photos, measurements and etc that will be helpful to obtaining a free quote.

[E-mail] info@tlmasonry.org
[Mobile] 647-646-3043
[Office] 647-403-5472

profile:
We are a Red Seal certified masonry company based out of Barrie. We take pride in our craft to ensure beautiful results!

OUR GOALS AND VALUES.
At Mammoth Masonry we are dedicated to safely providing masonry services of outstanding quality! It is our mission to have the utmost respect for our clients and fellow contractors.

WHAT IS OUR GUARANTEE.
We are incredibly proud of our craftsmanship and offer a lifetime warranty on all of our masonry work.

WHERE ARE WE LOCATED?
Mammoth is based out of Barrie, Ontario serving Simcoe, York and Muskoka. This includes but, is not limited to; Barrie, Collingwood, Oro-Medonte, Clearview, Wasaga Beach, Aurora, King, Newmarket, Richmond Hill, Whitchurch-Stouffville, Vaughan, Markham Gravenhurst and Bracebridge. 

OUR SERVICES

NEW CONSTRUCTION
Masonry on new construction whether it be stone, brick and/or block is something we at Mammoth are very passionate about. We take pride in ensuring our application is completed optimally for the longevity of our work and your project. We are also incredibly proud of the visual appeal of our work which in turn leaves you with a timeless build.   

Restoration
RESTORATION
Restoration of old or deteriorating masonry is something we at Mammoth take meticulous care in restoring! From matching the previously used material, the colour of the mortar and recreating ornate stone or brickwork there is no detail too small. 

HARDSCAPING
 Hardscaping can truly bring your front and backyard living spaces to life. From beautiful stone patios to stunning garden walls hardscaping can not only produce remarkable curb appeal but, it can assist in creating functional yet breathtaking entertainment areas. With Mammoth your vision can be met with spectacular hardscaping to last a lifetime!
name: Mammoth Masonry
